title: Weight Loss Pills & Supplements
cleaned_text: PRESCRIPTION MEDICATIONS Curb your cravings and boost your metabolism and energy level while your body adjusts to new, better eating habits. Prescription medications have been shown to increase weight loss by 50-100%. Medication is a "tool" to assist in the weight loss process. At Precise Medical Solutions, medications are prescribed in conjunction with following a sensible calorie controlled nutrition plan. This conjunction will greatly enhance the efficiency of the medication. An evaluation will be done to see what medication would be most appropriate for you because as always, each patient plan is customized to your unique medical profile and weight loss goals. Common "Diet Pills" or Weight Loss Drugs - (Bupropoin hydrochloride) Natural Appetite Suppressants STIMUKAL If you're looking to lose body fat, it comes down to burning calories, and we all know that this is no easy task. They're burned as a result of raising your core temperature, training hard and of course dieting to burn more calories than you're consuming. A daunting task, it only makes matters worse when you are hit with that dreaded 'diet brain fog'. StimuKal is the all in one solution for thermogenesis (raising core body temperature), craving control and long-lasting, 'feel good' energy. Unlike some of the 'other fat burners' out there, where the effects dwindle after you've used the product for a short period. StimuKal tackles that problem head on with adenosine & dopamine signaling components designed to optimize your body's response and keep the fat burning consistent day after day. With StimuKal, you'll be losing fat like never before and be on track to the body you want as quickly as possible. FORMULATED USING ONLY SCIENTIFICALLY RESEARCHED AND PROVEN INGREDIENTS. STIMUKAL IS DESIGNED TO: - Increase core temperature for maximum calorie burn - Long-lasting, "Feel Good" clean energy & focus - Suppress appetite & cravings - Target burning of stubborn body fat LIPO-DREX Cutting is never easy - you cut calories to cut fat out and lose weight. You tend to have low energy levels and you lose all your muscle gains. This is where Lipo-Drex is revolutionary. Lipo-Drex has powerful thermogenic properties designed to accelerate your metabolism and increase fat loss while delivering explosive energy! METABOLISM LIPO-DREX is designed to accelerate your metabolism by increasing thermogenesis. ENERGY LIPO-DREX delivers extreme energy with the likes of caffeine and other ingredients that work together to give you an energetic, high focus feeling. MUSCLE LIPO-DREX helps divert dietary carbs and fat from being stored as fat to be being shuttled to your hard-working muscles. The more nutrients that are stored in the muscle, the harder and fuller they will be. FAT BURNER SUPPLEMENTS HYDRAVAX - Diuretic Hydravax is a high-potency diuretic designed to help shed water weight while maintaining electrolytes and energy levels. The fast-acting Hydravax will help reduce swelling and bloating and eliminate unnecessary water to reveal harder, more-sculpted muscles. Stop by to get your bottle today. THYRENE - Thyroid Function Thyrene has been scientifically engineered to target specific areas that most thermogenic and fat loss products fail to attack. By concentrating on thyroid function, Thyrene uses specific ingredients to help you take charge of your slowing metabolism. Stop by to get your bottle today. FITMISS CLEANSE - Women's Daily Detoxifier & Cleanse! "Toxins" That's a scary word. It's even scarier to think that "toxins" exist in your body! So get rid of them! FitMiss Cleanse was specifically designed to get your digestive system clean and make you feel amazing. So start today and get clean and sexy from the inside out. Let's get cleansed! "EXCESS WASTES"... HOW IT COULD BE AFFECTING YOUR WEIGHT LOSS GOALS. THE PROBLEMS: The average person's colon is packed with 5 to 20 pounds of accumulated waste! If your stomach isn't flat, it's probably at least partially due to "waste pounds," This excess material makes you look heavier, drains energy and can cause sickness. THE SOLUTION: FITMISS CLEANSE. A full body cleansing and detoxification system for your colon, liver, kidneys, stomach, blood, urinary tract, lungs and skin! A daily cleanse may result in your clothes fitting loosely in the stomach area due to waste elimination. Fast and powerful yet gentle enough for travel, work and a normal routine. Removing toxins and accumulated waste eases bloating and gas, fights parasites and bacteria and improves your health and energy. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. 7-DAY CLEANSING DETOX The 7-Day Detox is perfect for when the body needs a reset or a jumpstart. It is a broad spectrum botanical 7 day program designed to cleanse and detoxify the entire body. In order to maximize the results of this program, it is essential that the product be taken with the specified amount of water with each serving alone with additional water intake throughout the afternoon and evening. DAILY DETOX Daily Detox will help to cleanse and refresh your body the natural way. These natural herbs are used to support the healthy functions of the liver and the kidneys while cleansing the body of toxins. NATURAL COLON CLEANSER Natural Colon Cleanser can be the extra help your body needs to become healthier and to stay healthy! It releases extra waste from the body, supports weight loss, and provides more energy. While your body can often cleanse itself of toxins and other harmful things, sometimes, it needs help in the process. The Natural Colon Cleanser can help to perform additional cleanses to ensure your digestive system stays on track and give you the support you need, without the unpleasant effects of laxatives. The natural ingredients in Colon Cleanser are designed to be gentle on your system. DIGESTIVE ENZYMES Digestive Enzymes are a comprehensive blend of vegetarian digestive enzymes, prebiotics and probiotics to support overall gastrointestinal health. Designed to counter the natural reduction in the production of digestive enzymes caused by nutrient-deficient, overly processed foods, stress, and environmental toxins, Digestive Enzymes help your body maximize the absorption of the nutrients it needs from the foods it processes. Digestive Enzymes with prebiotics and probiotics provide the healthy support you need for your maximized nutrient absorption. This healthy supplement helps: - Make the nutrients from the food you eat more accessible to the body. - Support healthy bacterial growth in the gut. - Assist in the body's natural production of B vitamins and vitamin K. - Reduce instances of bloating, cramping and battle bad breath. - Increase energy. PROBIOTICS - 30 Million CPU Naturade Probiotics 30 B CFU contains 30 billion colony forming units per capsule to help maintain healthy intestinal flora and naturally support your immune defenses. This proper balance is essential to maintaining an efficient digestive system because it aids in the digestion and absorption of food and nutrients. YOU CAN SEE CHANGES IN GASTROINTESTINAL SYMPTOMS FREQUENCY AFTER 14 DAYS SUPPLEMENTATION!!! UP4 ADULT - A Happier Inside Probiotics Whether you are active or sedentary, it is likely that you have a certain level of bad bacteria in your body. Without the proper probiotic, these bacteria build up over time and causes problems with your immune system and your digestive system. By taking the Adult formula, you can regulate your body and relieve the discomfort that sometimes comes with digestion. PFO PURE FISH OIL PFO Pure Fish Oil contains molecularly distilled, deep sea cold water fish oil in natural triglyceride form. It is encapsulated in fish gelatin and flavored with natural orange oil. This product is intended to provide nutritive support for a healthy cardiovascular system. HIMALAYA LIVERCARE LiverCare assists normally functioning liver cells. Its powerful combination of carefully extracted herbs supports normal liver function in many different ways. The liver has many responsibilities so it is important for it to be functioning on a normal level. Your Liver is responsible for storing nutrients, creating proteins, and even the building blocks for hormones and immune cells to name just a few. It also plays a major role in detoxification. HUMANOFORT - Increasing Natural Testosterone! Fitness Enterprise Humanofort promotes increased lean muscle size by increasing natural testosterone! The main ingredient in Humanofort is clinically proven through years of research and testing. Humanofort is formulated to: - Increase natural steroid levels, including DHEA and Testosterone, promoting increased lean muscle size. - Decrease oxidative stress leading to quick recovery. - Increase fat loss. Advantages of Humanofort: - Supports Healthy Sexual Function - Revive Tired Muscles - Reduce Physical & Mental Stress - Maintain Healthy Triglycerides - Burn Fat & Build Muscle - Promote Healing - Slow the Effects of Aging Process - Supports Healthy Sleep
